overview: A young man takes a succession of odd jobs in order to save enough money to buy he and his mother a house. He lands a position in a newspaper office and falls in love with the beautiful society editor, who is secretly having an affair with the married managing editor. She returns the young man's affections in order to make her lover jealous, but finds herself falling for him.
tagline: The Picture the Police Stopped in Dallas and Washington - Is it so terrible? See for Yourself!
title: Man, Woman and Sin
